models.classes

Class Domino

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.classes.Domino

  • public class Domino
extends java.lang.Object
    It is composed of two sides. The first has a number and the other has two LandPortion. A Player can appropriate a Domino by placing one of his Kings on it. The Domino can be turned in different directions (Rotation).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Domino(LandPortion leftPortion, LandPortion rightPortion, int number)
      Generates a Domino from two LandPortion (leftPortion and rightPortion) and a number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Domino

        public Domino(LandPortion leftPortion,
              LandPortion rightPortion,
              int number)
        Generates a Domino from two LandPortion (leftPortion and rightPortion) and a number.
        Parameters:
        leftPortion - Left LandPortion of the Domino.
        rightPortion - Right LandPortion of the Domino.
        number - Number of it.

    • Method Detail

      • isHorizontal

        public boolean isHorizontal()
        Return if the Domino is horizontal or not.
        Returns:
        true if the Domino is horizontal. false if the Domino is not horizontal (vertical then).
        See Also:
        Rotation

      • getDominoView

        public DominoView getDominoView()
        Get the DominoView of the Domino.
        Returns:
        if the view was not created, a new instance of DominoView. if the view was already created, the associated instance of DominoView.
        See Also:
        DominoView

      • setDominoView

        public void setDominoView(DominoView dominoView)
        Associates a DominoView to the Domino.
        Parameters:
        dominoView - DominoView to be associated to the Domino.

      • getKing

        public King getKing()
        Get the current King placed on the Domino.
        Returns:
        King placed on the Domino. Can be null.

      • setKing

        public void setKing(King king)
        Set the current King placed on the Domino. If the king parameter is not null, then the view of the Domino is impacted.
        Parameters:
        king - King to be placed on the Domino.

      • getRotation

        public Rotation getRotation()
        Get the current Rotation of the Domino.
        Returns:
        Current Rotation of the Domino.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(Rotation rotation)
        Set the current Rotation of the Domino. If the Rotation is INVERSE or NORMAL, then the leftLandPortion and the rightLandPortion are inverted.
        Parameters:
        rotation - The new current Rotation of the Domino.
        See Also:
        Rotation
